properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:57AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
WEATHER...

* Rain and freezing rain steadily changes over to all snow during
the late night.

* A small amount of icing is expected along with a coating of
snow accumulation less than 1 inch between 1 AM and 4 AM.

IMPACTS...

* Untreated roads will become increasingly hazardous as
temperatures continue falling below freezing.
properties.instruction:
* Motorists are urged to use caution and account for variable
driving conditions by slowing down and allowing extra time.

* Prepare, plan and stay informed. Visit http://go.usa.gov/c7kkP

NWSheadline: A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT DURING THE NIGHT
